100: Machine learning and data mining often employ the same methods and overlap significantly, but while
250: machine learning focuses on prediction, based on known properties learned from the training data, data mining focuses on the discovery of (previously)

1150: in a typical KDD task, supervised methods cannot be used due to the unavailability of training data.
